original_title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Spooky Tooth
overview: Set in Flossmore Valley and Egypt, Timmy, Brushbrush and Bubbles visit the pyramids on their official pyramid investigation business as they explore the pyramid of King Tooth Uncommon.

production_companies.name: Universal Studios Home Entertainment Family Productions
